review: For some, the concept of this product may work. I found it useless after two weeks and it's been unplugged since. - I've a paid cable subscription and Fire has no Time Warner app and the Fox Sports app is pathetically limited. - For my needs I've done much better with a Home Theater PC, which by the way, using Fire you're forced to subscribing to Hulu Plus, whereas Hulu Free is available on PC only.
